title: Amazing Rice Farming Techniques of Vietnam

subtasks: Sit in the tractor seat
Grip the steering wheel
Adjust the seat and mirrors
Start the tractor engine
Drive the tractor to the field

tasks.task: Plant seeds with a crop seeder
subtasks: Attach the seeder to the tractor
Adjust the seeder settings
Operate the seeder while driving
Ensure proper spacing and depth
Attach the cultivation tool to the tractor
Position the tool for the right depth
Control the tool's movement while driving
Fill the sprayer with pesticide or fertilizer
Attach the sprayer to the tractor
Adjust the spray nozzles
Drive through the field, applying chemicals
Attach the combine to the tractor
Operate the combine to cut the crops
Drive the combine to the grain elevator
Deposit the harvested grain
